Name: Hexa Trains
About the game: This game is about railroads. Make the planet's economy run smoothly by supplying all industries with railroad transport services. Lay the tracks, schedule the trains, and let the planet's economy thrive. You even need to supply transportation between the planet and its moon. Are you the infrastructure-hero that has the chops to manage inter-global transport? Find out in... Hexa Trains!
